document.full_text: united nations staff in western ivory coast have found more than 100 bodies in the past 24 hours, some burned alive and others thrown down a well, in a further sign of the ethnic violence gripping the country.
document.title: u.n. finds 115 bodies in western ivory coast
lines_and_colors: united nations staff in western ivory coast have found more than 100 bodies in the past 24 hours, some burned alive and others thrown down a well, in a further sign of the ethnic violence gripping the country.
